events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the product does not work as expected and I would like to request a refund.
System categorized the reported issue under the Refund cluster based on customer's mention of refund request.
The support case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for further handling of the refund request.
Hello, this is Sarah from customer support. I understand you'd like to request a refund and I am here to help.
Could you please provide the order number and a brief description of the issue with the product so we can proceed?
My order number is 123456789. The product simply does not turn on at all despite following all instructions.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund for your order and provide you with return shipping instructions shortly.
That sounds great. I appreciate the quick response and look forward to the refund being processed.
Your refund request has been processed successfully and the return label has been emailed to you.
Just following up to confirm that you have received the refund and that the return process went smoothly.
Yes, I received the refund yesterday and everything was handled very professionally. Thank you!
We are glad to hear that the refund has been completed to your satisfaction. Closing your support case now.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to you. We appreciate your feedback on our support experience.
